Come with us

Welcome to Journey - we're glad to have you! Journey is your local theatre group where folks of all ages get to play, create, and shine. We're all about boosting confidence and making great connections in our community through the magic of theatre. Whether you're a budding thespian or have never picked up a script, all are welcome. Come join the fun and let's make some memories together!

Who are we?

Journey is
